DANTE DONATI | PHOTOGRAPHY

Welcome to my photo-blog

Learn More

I am a PhD student of Economics and social sciences with a strong passion for travelling and human photography

This website is a reportage of some of the pictures I made around the world.
Most of them are from South East Asia and Africa.

  • Go to the Photo-blog
  • Lorem
  • Ipsum
  • Dolor

The Eyes of Nigeria

I made this picture in the outskirts of Ibadan, a 3 million people city in south-east Nigeria.

Naufragare

This image captures a breathtaking sunset in Togean Islands, Sulawesi, in Indonesia.

Childhood in Siem Reap

Children having fun with tourists inside one of the tamples of Angkor Wat, Cambodia.

Volcano Rinjani

Me and my guide and friend Jin at the top of Mount Rinjani, Lombok Island, Indonesia.

Vivere di Musica

This picture is part of a photography collection focusing on humans' life on the street. It was made at Parc de la Ciutadella, in Barcelona.
